trans-unit.source: It brings together the functionality of other Python analysis tools such as Pylint, pep8, and McCabe complexity. See the Supported Tools documentation section for a complete list.
trans-unit.target: It brings together the functionality of other Python analysis tools such as Pylint, pep8, and McCabe complexity. See the Supported Tools documentation section for a complete list.

trans-unit.source: Note that as far as possible, these adaptors have been written as plugins or augmentations for the underlying tools so that they can be used without requiring Prospector. For example, the Django support is available as a pylint plugin.
trans-unit.target: Obsérvese que,en la medida de lo posible,estos adaptadores se han escrito como complementos o aumentos de las herramientas subyacentes para que puedan utilizarse sin necesidad de Prospector.Por ejemplo,el soporte de Django está disponible como un plugin de pylint.

trans-unit.source: Often tools such as pylint find errors in code which is not an error, for example due to attributes of classes being created at run time by a library or framework used by your project. For example, by default, pylint will generate an error for Django models when accessing
trans-unit.target: A menudo,herramientas como pylint encuentran errores en el código que no es un error,por ejemplo,debido a que los atributos de las clases se crean en tiempo de ejecución por una biblioteca o un marco de trabajo utilizado por su proyecto.Por ejemplo,por defecto,pylint generará un error para los modelos Django al acceder a

trans-unit.source: Prospector is a tool to analyse Python code and output information about errors, potential problems, convention violations and complexity.
trans-unit.target: Prospector es un instrumento para analizar el código Python y producir información sobre los errores,los posibles problemas,las violaciones de las convenciones y la complejidad.

trans-unit.source: Prospector is available under the GPLv2 License.
trans-unit.target: Prospector está disponible bajo la licencia GPLv2.

trans-unit.source: Prospector is configurable using “profiles”. These are composable YAML files with directives to disable or enable tools or messages. For more information, read the documentation about profiles.
trans-unit.target: Prospector is configurable using “profiles”. These are composable YAML files with directives to disable or enable tools or messages. For more information, read the documentation about profiles.

trans-unit.source: Prospector mitigates this by providing an understanding of these frameworks to the underlying tools.
trans-unit.target: El prospector mitiga esto proporcionando una comprensión de estos marcos a las herramientas subyacentes.

trans-unit.source: Prospector will try to intuit which libraries your project uses by detecting dependencies and automatically turning on support for the requisite libraries. You can see which adaptors were run in the metadata section of the report.
trans-unit.target: Prospector will try to intuit which libraries your project uses by detecting dependencies and automatically turning on support for the requisite libraries. You can see which adaptors were run in the metadata section of the report.
Prospector:herramienta de análisis estático de la pitón

El formato de salida por defecto de

trans-unit.source: The primary aim of Prospector is to be useful ‘out of the box’. A common complaint of other Python analysis tools is that it takes a long time to filter through which errors are relevant or interesting to your own coding style. Prospector provides some default profiles, which hopefully will provide a good starting point and will be useful straight away, and adapts the output depending on the libraries your project uses.
trans-unit.target: The primary aim of Prospector is to be useful ‘out of the box’. A common complaint of other Python analysis tools is that it takes a long time to filter through which errors are relevant or interesting to your own coding style. Prospector provides some default profiles, which hopefully will provide a good starting point and will be useful straight away, and adapts the output depending on the libraries your project uses.
